body_html:
I do not think there are promising project which demonstrate good performance on Intel GPUs.
I know that OpenCL can work on these GPUs, but I am not sure about the performance.
This will definitely need to be a community contribution, as we have no plans for this.

@claynerobison any resources on Intel GPUs you can point us to?

body:
I do not think there are promising project which demonstrate good performance on Intel GPUs.
I know that OpenCL can work on these GPUs, but I am not sure about the performance.
This will  definitely need to be a community contribution, as we have no plans for this.

@claynerobison any resources on Intel GPUs you can point us to?
